idea:
The UAV (Drone) industry is growing rapidly every day. Considering the regular problems that affect human life, such as traffic, accidents, and safety, we are starting to address this problem using Robotic Drone with Regeneration and Solar system.

"Regeneration" is the concept used for the drone engines to accelerate the Propeller with regenerative energy. Use of the solar system as reserve energy Into dry batteries for Drones. This conserves the battery and increases flight time. In the Aerospace Industry, an enormous amount of energy is developed by propellers, and if regenerative energy is used in the rockets, it is easy to traverse the orbits with less fuel.

The aim is to make drone transport and drone services smooth and cost efficient.
name: Infinity Flyer- Beyond the Limit

idea:
Plastic is inexpensive and durable as a result the level of production by humans is high. The chemical structure of most of the plastic render them resistant to the natural process of degradation. These factors have led to high prominence of plastic pollution. This large amount of littered plastic waste enters the environment and poses a threat to plants, animals and humans.

Our start up proposes to solve this problem by diverting plastic waste from landfill towards recycling and creating value out of waste. This value can further be used for manufacturing plastic and plastic components. C
name: TECHNOPLAST INDUSTRIES LLP
